resources.string: The functionality you requested requires an Internet connection. No Internet connection has been found.
Are you sure you want to restore database to default?
Are you sure you want to this delete category?
Are you sure you want to delete this vocabulary?
This is default category, cannot be deleted
This is default vocabulary, cannot be deleted
This category name is already existed, please rename
Please delete vobaulary in the tab before adding new one
Please add both word and picture

"AAC on Android Chula application is developed by Eng chula team

To start speaking,choose Categories and then select vocabulary.

For changing language and restore to default, choose Settings.

For more categories and vocabularies, choose Downloads.

Look at vocabulary in a category: Click at a category

Add: Click Menu button, select add category, a windows for insert category shows, insert category’s name, select photo for the category, click Save.

Delete: Long press over a category you want to delete, a confirm dialog box shows, click Yes to delete the category. (You can delete only category that is not a default category.

"Play voice: After click at a vocabulary you want to play voice, click Play button to play voice

Concatenate vocabulary: Click at next vocabulary after you click the first vocabulary to concatenate it into a sentence. (You can select at most 8 vocabularies to synthesis a speech.)

Text-to-speech: Click Menu button, select Text-to-speech, type the word you want to synthesis a speech, click Play button.

Add: Click Menu button, select add vocabulary, a windows for insert category shows, insert category’s name, select photo for the category, click Save.

Delete: Long press over a vocabulary you want to delete, a confirm dialog box shows, click Yes to delete the vocabulary. (You can delete only vocabulary that is not a default vocabulary.
Touch the green robot to Compose
The current default TTS does not support the current language.
The item is already at the top of the list.
The item is already at the end of the list.
The current arrangment has not been saved. Do you want to leave this page?
Check the category you would like to download from the list.
